params.923: Should drinks, such as potions, be allowed?
params.925:
Should special attacks be allowed?
The Staff of the Dead, and equivalent items, can be barred even if other special attacks are permitted.
params.2336:
What should happen to a player who leaves a chat-channel mid-fight?
The game may attempt to count it as a kill by the opposing team, if selected.
params.2338: Should players be able to rejoin the fight without a delay after dying?
params.2340: How large a team is permitted?
